description: Numbers n such that 2^n + 19 is prime.
comments: a(14) > 5*10^5. - _Robert Price_, Aug 27 2015All terms are even. - _Robert Israel_, Aug 28 2015
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ 2^n + 19 ], Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 15000} ]Select[Range[10000], PrimeQ[2^# + 19] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 28 2015 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 17 2000
